Getting Started With Quick Installation

Once you have installed ZStack on a Linux machine following instructions in Quick Installation, you immediately get everything ready to create your first cloud.

To access the web UI, open your browser with URL:

  http://ip_of_machine_installing_zstack:5000

To use command line tool, type zstack-cli on the machine that ZStack is installed:

  root@ubuntu1404:~# zstack-cli

Now your ZStack environment is ready, please visit Tutorials to create your first cloud deployment using either web UI or command line tool, or check out User Manual for a full reference. We also suggest you read Getting Started With Manual Installation for useful zstack-ctl commands that can configure and control ZStack management node.
